name: type hi // letterpress notecards // set of 3
description:
Are you or your friend a typophile? Do you love to stare at the alphabet all day long? Do you find the slight imperfections of the letterpress printing process truly satisfying? With these fun colored alphabet notecards, you can surprise three friends with tangible typography and say "Hi" at the same time.

Please note that you will not find perfection here. These cards were printed using vintage moveable type. The type has been dinged and chipped through the course of time, and those slight imperfections show in the prints. If that's your cup of tea, then these cards are for you. =)

This is a set of 3 letterpress notecards.

I currently have more in stock than may be listed. Card are also available individually or you can order a custom quantity of any of the three colors. Please contact me if you'd like to place a custom order.

More photos coming soon.



INK // Teal, Grey or Yellow with Red

STOCK // Printed on Flourescent White Crane Lettra 110lb. 100% cotton card stock. Comes with white envelope.

SIZE // 5.5" x 4.25" folded notecard. Blank inside.

PRESS // Each card was letterpress printed on a vintage Vandercook Model No. 4 ("Professor Cook") and then finished on a Golding Pearl Model No. 7, ("Lucy Pearl").

PROCESS // Letterpress is a tedious and labor intensive process that utilizes hand mixed PMS inks and involves hand feeding each sheet, one at a time. Our paper (or preferred 100% cotton stock) is cut, scored and folded by hand, in-house. Slight variations in color, registration and impression may occur. Because of the nature of this process, no two prints will be exactly alike. **That's the beauty of letterpress.

SHIPPING // Unless otherwise requested, this item will ship via USPS first class services.

©Catherine Lorenzo Realce, visualchemist

name: my flywheel is so fly //  silkscreen printed tee
description:
Do you have a letterpress with a flywheel? Does it have swagger? Whether your flywheel has straight spokes or fancy curved spokes, let the world know just how fly your flywheel is. Oh, yeah.

Shop aprons are also available in black. Please see other listing in the 'letterpress themed apparel' category.


INK // White ink printed on black womens spandex/cotton blend OR mens all cotton tees.

SIZE // Standard mens and womens sizes available.

PRESS // Silkscreen print.

SHIPPING // Unless otherwise requested, this item will ship via USPS first class or flat rate services.

©Catherine Lorenzo Realce, visualchemist

*In case you were wondering: *A flywheel is a heavy wheel that stores kinetic energy and smooths the operation of a reciprocating engine by maintaining a constant speed of rotation over the whole cycle —dictionary.com

name: i love typography coaster // qty 1
description:
Do you love typography? 

Rest your beverage and brush up on your typography anatomy at the same time. Use this coaster for what it is or hang it on your inspiration wall. Better yet, leave it on your desk so you can run your fingers over deliciously tactile typography whenever you need to escape the harsh realities of the present, and take a step back in the past. {Letterpress is an ancient art that dates back to the mid-15th century.}

The "I Love Typography" coaster was originally designed for the Love & Letterpress coaster exchange. 

This is a listing for 1 coaster, although you are more than welcome to order enough to create a set. {BTW, an actual 'set' of typography inspired coasters are in the works.} 

INK // Warm Red + Black + Gray

STOCK // Printed on heavyweight off white coaster stock. 

SIZE // 4" x 4" 

PRESS // Each coaster was handfed on a vintage Golding Pearl Model No. 7, also known as "Lucy Pearl."

PROCESS // Letterpress is a tedious and labor intensive process that utilizes hand mixed PMS inks and involves hand feeding each sheet, one at a time, one color at a time. With the exception of coasters, our paper (or preferred 100% cotton stock) is cut, scored and folded by hand, in-house. Slight variations in color, registration and impression may occur. Because of the nature of this process, no two prints will be exactly alike. {That's the beauty of letterpress.}

SHIPPING // Shipping is combined for multiple items. Unless otherwise requested, this item will ship via USPS first class services.

©Catherine Lorenzo Realce, visualchemist

name: thank you, i love it! // letterpress notecard // qty 6
description:
It's always good to have a few thank you cards laying around, but instead of stopping there, express how much you LOVE whatever it was that you were given. A little gratitude goes a long way. 

This is a set of 6 letterpress notecards.

I currently have more in stock than may be listed. Please contact me if you'd like to place a custom order.


INK // Raspberry + Truffle

STOCK // Printed on Pearl White Crane Lettra 110lb. 100% cotton card stock. Comes with white envelope.

SIZE // 5" x 3.5" flat card

PRESS // Each card was letterpress printed on a vintage Golding Pearl Model No. 7, also known as "Lucy Pearl."

PROCESS // Letterpress is a tedious and labor intensive process that utilizes hand mixed PMS inks and involves hand feeding each sheet, one at a time. Our paper (or preferred 100% cotton stock) is cut, scored and folded by hand, in-house. Slight variations in color, registration and impression may occur. Because of the nature of this process, no two prints will be exactly alike. **That's the beauty of letterpress.

©Catherine Lorenzo Realce, visualchemist

name: 143. // red + black letterpress notecard // qty 1
description:
143 = I love you.

The 143 statement is a nod to 90's "pager code" (a numeric code created to send messages using numbers assigned to represent letters of the alphabet). Send a notecard to someone you love to tell them "143."

INK // red + black (blank inside)

STOCK // bright white lightweight card stock with matching white envelope

SIZE // 5" x 3.5" 

EDITION // 20

PRESS // Each card was hand presses on a antique Chandler & Price Pilot letterpress using vintage wood type.

PROCESS // Letterpress is a tedious and labor intensive process that utilizes hand mixed inks and involves hand feeding each sheet, one at a time. Sure, slight variations in color, registration and impression may occur. Because of the nature of this process, no two prints will be exactly alike. **That's what makes them so special.

©Catherine Lorenzo Realce, visualchemist

name: i like you. // red+black letterpress notecard // qty 1
description: Not ready to say the "L" word? Then say the other "L" word. Afterall, everyone goes through the "Like" stage before they fall in "Love." Tell someone they give you butterflies without being so wimpy about it. Say it in Helvetica, and leave an impression. A deep impression, ... one created using vintage metal type. They might "love" you for it. description: Whether you're moving on up to the East Side, or to the deluxe apartment in the sky, make sure your friends, family and neighbors know where to find you. name: 4" Square Coaster Blank {Pre-sale}
description:
4" Square Coaster Blanks {Pre-sale}

These blank coasters are for Love+Letterpress exchange participants.

I will have about 14 packs available, which will be mailed out as soon as they arrive here at my studio in the early part of January. These coasters will be on a first come basis. 

This is how I broke down the materials costs, which covers shipping fees and packaging.

$3.00 / Heavy Weight sleeve of 60 coasters
